participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Caring and introspective, values personal connections and is a bit shy.
participant_1.background: My family is close and we like to go out for ice cream together. I have a crush on a girl from my class, but I'm too afraid to tell her. It's good to eat a lot of veggies. I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance. I grew up in Nevada.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and optimistic, values friendships and has a passion for animal welfare.
participant_2.background: I spent more time climbing since I quit my job. I can't live without my friends. I will be on bed rest for the next 5 months. I like to visit the website for the Humane Society because it has a lot of information about animal welfare issues and how to help animals in need. I'm originally from a small town in the Midwest, but I've been living in the city for a few years now.

content.text: Hey how is your day going?
Hi! So far so good, I'm on bed rest for the next 5 months but I'm trying to stay positive.
I fell from a rock climbing wall and broke my leg, but I'm getting better slowly.
Oh man that sucks! Hopefully it heals quickly!
Thanks! I'm trying to keep myself busy. I've been reading a lot and spending time with my family.
I just finished a book called "The Great Gatsby" and I'm starting a new one called "The Catcher in the Rye".
I've heard great things about both of those books! I've been wanting to read them for a while.
You should! They're both really good.
I have a dog named Charlie and a cat named Mittens.
Aww, I love animals! I grew up with a dog and a cat.
They're the best! I love them so much.
What are you going to do when you're off bed rest?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm looking forward to getting back to my normal life.
I'm sure you'll be back to climbing in no time!
Thanks for the encouragement! I hope so!
